I don't know how to change the format to .mp4, can someone help me?

DarthPS3 - I'm guessing you have a windows based Pc. So, from "My Computer" choose "Tools" then "Folder Options" Then to the "View" tab. Make sure "Hide extensions for known file types" is not checked. Then go to the vid file and simply rename the file extension to .mp4
